alert.note: Alert for Conway; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southeast Van Buren County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Logan, central Perry, western Van Buren, Conway, northeastern Yell and Pope Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Dardanelle State Park to 6 miles southwest of Carden Bottoms to 11 miles southeast of Ola. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Perryville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... Ola... London... Oppelo... Hector... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Bethlehem... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Happy Bend... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
